function.name: searchDatabase
function.description: Based on the given game description, it searches for similar games in the database

url.description: The URL that will be used to retrieve the vector representation (embedding) of the data.

model.description: Model for creating vector representations (embeddings) of data

metric.description: A metric that determines the closeness of vector representations (embeddings)

prompt.description: Data to be converted into vector representation (embedding)
